definition: gardenia/cape jasmine (Gardenia jasminoides)/same as 栀子

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Geniposide and crocin are two major chemical components of Gardenia jasminoides Eillis.
sentences.chinese: 素是栀子中的两种主要化学成分。

sentences.english: Objective To determine the content of geniposide in Jieyu Anshen capsules.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立测定解郁安神胶囊中栀子苷含量的方法。

sentences.english: GJE can alleviate their damage and protect pancreatic cell.
sentences.chinese: 栀子能减轻三者的损伤，保护胰腺细胞。

sentences.english: The results indicated that crocin of gardenia fruits is a a main effect on color of pigment formed.
sentences.chinese: 京尼平甙和藏红花素是栀子中的两种主要化学成分。

sentences.english: Her favourite essence smells like gardenias.
sentences.chinese: 她喜欢的香水闻起来像栀子花。

sentences.english: That day I prepared and Gardenia out relax and so hurried away.
sentences.chinese: 这天我和栀子准备出去散心，于是就匆匆的出去了。

sentences.english: Gardenia opened and ups and downs, went to another Swallow.
sentences.chinese: 栀子花开了又落，燕子去了又来。

sentences.english: When being fragrant in the Cape jasmine flower, parting is in sight.
sentences.chinese: 每逢栀子花芬芳的时候，离别就是在即。

sentences.english: Spritz yourself up to smell like a bouquet of gardenias and you won’t get the chance to leave lipstick on his cheek.
sentences.chinese: 把自己喷的像一束栀子花是不会吻到男人脸颊的。

sentences.english: Her favorite essence smells like gardenias.
sentences.chinese: 她喜欢的香水闻起来象栀子花。

sentences.english: ConclusionIt may produce the new antihemorrhagic active constituent in carbonized Gardenia Jasminoides.
sentences.chinese: 结论栀子炒炭后可能产生了新的止血活性物质。

sentences.english: The objective of the study is to optimize the process for extraction technology of total iridoid glycoside of Cape Jasmine Fruit.
sentences.chinese: 优选栀子总环烯醚萜苷的提取工艺路线。

sentences.english: So many flowers, my favorite is the gardenia in front of my house.
sentences.chinese: 这么多花，我最喜欢的就是我家门前的栀子花。

sentences.english: However, red kojic red and gardenia blue have no antioxidant activity.
sentences.chinese: 而红曲米色素和栀子蓝色素不具有抗氧活性。

sentences.english: On muggy summer night, gardenia brought about memories in the South.
sentences.chinese: 闷热的夏夜，栀子花带来关于南方的回忆。

sentences.english: Now i want to talk story about gardenia .
sentences.chinese: 现在我想说一个关于栀子花的故事。

definition: Chinese peony (Paeonia lactiflora)/common herbaceous peony/peony used in TCM
black atractylodes rhizome (dried rhizome of any of several atractylodes species) (TCM)
root of herbaceous peony (Paeonia lactiflora), used in TCM
schizonepeta, herb used in Chinese medicine
